name: password-reset-verification
description: Allows user to verify email address before reseting password

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

emailAddressLabelText.comment: Text display as label for email address textbox.

verificationCodeLabelText.comment: Text display as label for verification code textbox.

verificationCodeSendSuccess.value: Verification code has been sent to your inbox. Please copy it to the verification code input box.
verificationCodeSendSuccess.comment: Message to display on verification code is send successfully.

emailAddressVerifiedSuccess.value: E-mail address verified. You can now continue
emailAddressVerifiedSuccess.comment: Message to display on email address is verified successfully.

requriedEmailError.comment: Error to display when user didn't enter email address.

invalidEmailError.comment: Error to display when email format is invalid.

retryError.value: That code is incorrect. Please try again.
retryError.comment: Error to display when user entered invalid code.

retryNotAllowedError.value: You have made too many incorrect attempts. Please try again later.
retryNotAllowedError.comment: Error to display when user entered invalid code to many time and no more try is allowed.

throttledError.value: There have been too many requests to verify this email address. Please wait a while, then try again.
throttledError.comment: Error to display when too many requests is submitted to verify email address.

codeExpiredError.value: That code is expired. Please request a new code.
codeExpiredError.comment: Error to display when code expired.

serverError.value: We are having trouble verifying your email address. Please enter a valid email address and try again.
serverError.comment: Error to display on server error.
